alert.note: Alert for Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Maricao; Mayaguez; San German (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 04 at 2:37PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM AST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Cabo Rojo, Hormigueros, Maricao, Mayaguez and San German, Puerto Rico. * WHEN...Until 445 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 135 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Areas most affected are from northern Cabo Rojo through Mayaguez and westward into Maricao and San German. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Cabo Rojo; Hormigueros; Maricao; Mayaguez; San German
